duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform merchandise processing duties to support the merchandising function of the store, including receiving, unpacking, and preparing merchandise for the sales floor.
Maintain cleanliness of the receiving area and facility, ensuring a safe shopping and working environment for customers and associates.
Assist with floor tasks, seasonal sets, daily maintenance, and other duties to support the overall benefit of the store.
Ring the register and provide warm and friendly customer assistance.

education_certification.credential: Must be 18 or rising senior in high school. High school diploma or GED preferred.
